languages.text: "Ложь! Фесмофориус не дразнит еретиков, а наводит на них ужас! Оправдывать свою оплошность священным орудием справедливости — неслыханное преступление!"
"Lies! The Phesmophorius does not taunt heretics, it fills them with terror! To shift the blame for your own failure onto a sacred weapon of justice is a heinous crime in and of itself!"
languages.original_text: "Ложь! Фесмофориус не дразнит еретиков, а наводит на них ужас! Оправдывать свою оплошность священным орудием справедливости — неслыханное преступление!"

traits.locale_text: "Lies! The Phesmophorius does not taunt heretics, it fills them with terror! To shift the blame for your own failure to a sacred weapon of justice is a heinous crime in and of itself!"
"Lies! The Phesmophorius does not taunt heretics, it fills them with terror! To shift the blame for your own failure to a sacred weapon of justice is a heinous crime in and of itself!"

"Lies! The Phesmophorius does not taunt heretics, it fills them with terror! To shift the blame for your own failure onto a sacred weapon of justice is a heinous crime in and of itself!"

languages.text: “胡说八道！菲斯摩弗瑞斯根本不会激怒那些异端分子，只会让他们恐惧不已！你居然把自己的失职推诿到这件神圣的正义武器上，这本身就是异端恶行！”
languages.original_text: "Lies! The Phesmophorius does not taunt heretics, it fills them with terror! To shift the blame for your own failure onto a sacred weapon of justice is a heinous crime in and of itself!"

traits.locale_text: “胡说八道！菲斯摩弗瑞斯根本不会激怒那些异端分子，只会让他们恐惧不已！你居然把自己的失职推诿到这件神圣的正义武器上，这本身就是异端恶行！”

languages.text: «¡Embustes! ¡El fesmoforio no incita a los herejes, les infunde terror! ¡Culpar de su incompetencia a un instrumento sagrado de la justicia es un crimen abyecto!».
languages.original_text: "Lies! The Phesmophorius does not taunt heretics, it fills them with terror! To shift the blame for your own failure onto a sacred weapon of justice is a heinous crime in and of itself!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Embustes! ¡El fesmoforio no incita a los herejes, les infunde terror! ¡Culpar de su incompetencia a un instrumento sagrado de la justicia es un crimen abyecto!».

languages.text: "Yalan! Pesmoforyus; kâfirleri germez, onları dehşetle doldurur! Kendi başarısızlığının suçunu kutsal bir adalet silahının üzerine atmak, başlı başına iğrenç bir suçtur!"
languages.original_text: "Lies! The Phesmophorius does not taunt heretics, it fills them with terror! To shift the blame for your own failure onto a sacred weapon of justice is a heinous crime in and of itself!"

traits.locale_text: "Yalan! Pesmoforyus; kâfirleri germez, onları dehşetle doldurur! Kendi başarısızlığının suçunu kutsal bir adalet silahının üzerine atmak, başlı başına iğrenç bir suçtur!"

languages.text: 「嘘をつくな！フェスモフォリウスは異端者を愚弄しない。やつらが恐怖に満たされたのだ。お前自身の失敗を神聖な正義の武器に帰することは、それ自体が凶悪犯罪だ！」
languages.original_text: "Lies! The Phesmophorius does not taunt heretics, it fills them with terror! To shift the blame for your own failure onto a sacred weapon of justice is a heinous crime in and of itself!"

traits.locale_text: 「嘘をつくな！フェスモフォリウスは異端者を愚弄しない。やつらが恐怖に満たされたのだ。お前自身の失敗を神聖な正義の武器に帰することは、それ自体が凶悪犯罪だ！」

languages.text: « Mensonges ! Le Phesmophorius ne provoque pas les hérétiques, il les paralyse de terreur ! Reprocher votre propre échec au bras armé de la justice sacrée est un crime odieux ! »
languages.original_text: "Lies! The Phesmophorius does not taunt heretics, it fills them with terror! To shift the blame for your own failure onto a sacred weapon of justice is a heinous crime in and of itself!"

traits.locale_text: « Mensonges ! Le Phesmophorius ne provoque pas les hérétiques, il les paralyse de terreur ! Reprocher votre propre échec au bras armé de la justice sacrée est un crime odieux ! »

languages.text: "Lügen! Der Phesmophorius provoziert Ketzer nicht, er erfüllt sie mit Angst und Schrecken! Die Schuld für Euer eigenes Versagen auf eine heilige Waffe der Gerechtigkeit zu schieben, ist selbst ein schändliches Verbrechen!"
languages.original_text: "Lies! The Phesmophorius does not taunt heretics, it fills them with terror! To shift the blame for your own failure onto a sacred weapon of justice is a heinous crime in and of itself!"

traits.locale_text: "Lügen! Der Phesmophorius provoziert Ketzer nicht, er erfüllt sie mit Angst und Schrecken! Die Schuld für Euer eigenes Versagen auf eine heilige Waffe der Gerechtigkeit zu schieben, ist selbst ein schändliches Verbrechen!"
